price: Hai Yaḥyā, ambillah 899 Alkitab (Taurat) itu dengan sungguh-sungguh.  Dan kami berikan kepadanya hikmah 900 selagi ia masih kanak-kanak,
arabic: يَٰيَحۡيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِقُوَّةٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمَ صَبِيّٗا
footnotes:
899.  Maksudnya, pelajarilah Taurat itu, amalkan isinya, dan sampaikan kepada umatmu. 
900.  Maksudnya, pemahaman Taurat dan pendalaman agama.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāyaḥyā khudhi al-kitāba biquwwatin waātaynāhu al-ḥuk'ma ṣabiyyan
